title: Equity Alliance, Investor in Minority- and Female-Led Venture Funds, Raises $28.6 Million
sub_head: Chaired by former Time Warner CEO Richard Parsons, the fund of funds is backed by luminaries of the venture and business worlds and joins a number of other efforts aimed at democratizing access to capital
body:
Equity Alliance, a new firm backed by boldface names in business and venture capital, has closed a $28.6 million fund to invest in venture funds led by women and minority managers.
While the firm is focused on returns, it also aims to provide a professional network and mentoring for the managers it backs, said Richard Parsons, chairman of Equity Alliance.
